titleStmt.title: The cause of the innocent pleaded, his accusers pretended charge confvted, their unparallel'd actings, ungospel-like dealings, and unrighteous proceedings against their pastor, declared, or, Truth breaking forth, through the mist of clouds and slanders published by Samuel Bradley ...
titleStmt.author: Bradley, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
